title: Topics in Innovation, Technology, and Operations Management
description: Introduces advanced topics of special interest in technology, innovation, and operations management. Students will acquire skills to apply rigorous theoretical models to data-rich real-life applications, including hospital and healthcare operations, manufacturing and supply chain management, technology supply chains, etc. May be taken for credit up to three times. Prerequisites: MGT 71 or MGT 71R or MGT 171 or MGT 171R.
